title: Republish current draft app exactly as-is

requirements.summary: Republish the currently deployed draft app without making any source changes.
acceptanceCriteria: No source files (frontend or backend) are modified as part of this work.
A new deployment is produced from the current codebase and is accessible for preview/publishing.

file_operations.description: No-op verification only: confirm this entry file (and the overall frontend) remains byte-for-byte unchanged in the republish process; do not apply or commit any editsâ€”republish from the current repository state.
